Submodules¶

modOpt.model module¶

Imported packages¶

class modOpt.model.Model(X, BOUNDS, XSYMBOLIC, FSYMBOLIC, PARAMS, JACOBIAN)[source]¶

Mathematical Model

This module stores all information about state variable bounds, parameters, and the permutation arrays referring to decomposition methods like Dulmage-Mendelsohn.

Attributes:

StateVarValues:list with arrays of dimension m with current values of state variables. (in global order)
XBounds:list with arrays of dimension m with current sets of state variable bounds. (in global order)
XSymbolic:sympy array of dimension m with symbolic expression of state variables. (in global order)
Parameter:array with values for model parameter
RowPerm:array of dimension m with permutation order of equations regarding their global index (1…m)
ColPerm:array of dimension n with permutation order of variables regarding their global index (1…n)
Blocks:List with blocks referring to permuted index (not global index) Example: For a 5x5 system a structure could be: [[0], [1, 2], [3], [4]] with one 2-dimensional block consisting of the permuted equations and variables 2 and 3.
getBoundsOfPermutedModel(xBounds, xSymbolic, parameter)[source]¶

Calculates bounds of the Function residuals based on current state variable bounds.

Args:
xBounds:numpy array with state variables bounds
xSymbolic:sympy array with symbolic state variables
parameter:numpy array with parameter values
Return:numpy array with residual bounds
getJacobian(X)[source]¶
Return:jacobian evaluated at X
getParameter()[source]¶
Return:paramter values
getSymbolicFunctions()[source]¶
Return:symbolic equations of equation system
getXBounds()[source]¶
Return:current state variable bounds
getXSymbolic()[source]¶
Return:symbolic variables
getXValues()[source]¶
Return:current state variable values
setXBounds(xBounds)[source]¶

sets the state variable bounds to the intervals given by the array xBounds

updateToPermutation(rowPerm, colPerm, blocks)[source]¶

updates the row and column order of the Jacobian to the indices given by the lists rowPerm and colPerm.
